## Load required packages

We first load all required packages; all CRAN packages are retrieved in a snapshot of CRAN taken on 2023-01-01.

```{r}
## Load CRAN packages:
library("cowplot")
library("dismo")
library("ggcorrplot")
library("ggpubr")
library("grid")
library("here")
library("mgcv")
library("mgcViz")
library("ncdf4")
library("raster")
library("rgdal")
library("sf")
library("sgat")
library("sp")
library("tidyverse")
library("wesanderson")

## Load non-CRAN packages:
library("kuenm")
```

Then we set up the working directory using the library `{here}`:

```{r}
## Set up working directory:
here::i_am("analysis/01_environ.Rmd")
```
